alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Harris; Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:44PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Spalding, south central Fayette, eastern Meriwether, Pike, northwestern Upson, southeastern Coweta, northwestern Talbot and northeastern Harris Counties through 615 PM EST ... At 544 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Turin to near Greenville to near Pine Mountain Valley, and moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, Zebulon, Greenville, Manchester, Woodbury, Brooks, Warm Springs, Molena, Williamson, Haralson, Gay, Sunset Village, Shiloh, Concord, Atwater, Hilltop, Flint Hill, Hollonville, Sprewell Bluff State Park, and Rover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Coweta; Harris; Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Upson
